resources.string: This application provides following functionality list: translating with and without auto detection, adding translations to history list and favorites, manipulating with elements of mentioned lists.

Yandex Translator uses Yandex.Translate API to translate typed words and provides link to Yandex Translate service by displaying Powered by Yandex.Translate label in each screen which has translated content.
This application was developed as a task test of Yandex company to show author\'s abilities in Java programming on Android Platform.
